page.title: 05HOME LIFE:A SCHOOL DAY
page.content: {A SCHOOL DAY I GOT UP AT 7.30am.I HAD MY BREAKFAST OF READY BREAK AND A CUP OF TEA.8.20am SET OFF FOR SCHOOL.9am I HAD REGISTRATION.MY FIRST 2 LESSONS WERE ART,I MADE A CLAY ANIMAL.AFTER BREAK I COPIED SOME WRITING ABOUT DENSITY FROM THE BOARD IN SCIENCE.I HAD SAUSSEGES BEANS AND CHIPS FOR LUNCH.IN THE AFTERNOON I HAD ENGLISH AND MATHS.I WENT TO BED AT 10.00pm BY{SUSAN BRITTON { A SATURDAY I GOT UP AT 9am.FOR BREAKFAST I HAD CORNFLAKES AND TOAST.I PLAYED FOOTBALL AND CYCLED TO THE CANNAL AFTER LUNCH.I PLAYED ROLAND GOES DIGGING ON MY FRIENDS COMPUTER.I WATCHED THE RUGBY LEAGUE CUP FINAL, IT WAS A GOOD GAME WIGAN WON.I HAD TEA,WATCHED TV WHILE 10pm BY{RICHARD SAGAR
